metadata.Title: CVE-2014-9236 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.Description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in php/edit_photos.php in Zoph (aka Zoph Organizes Photos) 0.9.1 and earlier allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via the (1) photographer_id or (2) _crumb parameter.

notes.Note: ebarretto> According to Debian: The SQL injection and XSS claims appear to be mostly unfounded.

criterions.comment: zoph package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
